metadata.title: CVE-2014-8326 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in phpMyAdmin 4.0.xbefore 4.0.10.5, 4.1.x before 4.1.14.6, and 4.2.x before 4.2.10.1 allowremote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via acrafted (1) database name or (2) table name, related to thelibraries/DatabaseInterface.class.php code for SQL debug output and thejs/server_status_monitor.js code for the server monitor page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8326` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.2.10.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.2.10.1-1').
